item.title: Trump Is Not To Blame For Democrats Electing Violent Extremists
item.description: Democrats have a long history of defending and electing party leaders engaged in the worst behavior imaginable, while Republican voters are still reje...

item.title: Des Moines Election Proves Once Again You Can’t Fix Stupid
item.description: Incumbents were reelected to the same school board that hired an illegal immigrant convict to serve as superintendent.

item.title: If Republicans Don’t Focus On The Economy, They’ll Lose In The Midterms Too
item.description: If Republicans don’t pass a tangible agenda over the next 12 months, they will face another electoral reckoning next fall.

item.title: Will Polls Keep Showing Less Support For Queer Policies As Zoomers Age?
item.description: New polling offers a growing opportunity for Christians to present God’s natural order as good and Christ’s offer of salvation as necessary.

item.title: Longest Shutdown Ever Reveals U.S. Could Stand To Fire A Lot Of Federal Workers
item.description: One thing the shutdown seems to show is that there may very well be quite a few federal employees America could do without.
